about_the_game:
I Am Etheric is a realistic first-person horror game with spiritual touches, visit an abandoned psychiatric hospital and solve the mystery with your special power, survive, solve puzzles, explore the place and get out of there alive .

Play as Alex who is a person with spiritual power who is dedicated to banishing archons from haunted places, this time you will face a level 9 archon.

Too strong for you

you will have to find the path and the light to defeat him

• With history and argument

• Light versus darkness

• A game of fear and terror but also with spiritual connotations.

• It is a fictional game but also based on the author's own experiences
detailed_description:
I Am Etheric is a realistic first-person horror game with spiritual touches, visit an abandoned psychiatric hospital and solve the mystery with your special power, survive, solve puzzles, explore the place and get out of there alive .

Play as Alex who is a person with spiritual power who is dedicated to banishing archons from haunted places, this time you will face a level 9 archon.

Too strong for you

you will have to find the path and the light to defeat him

• With history and argument

• Light versus darkness

• A game of fear and terror but also with spiritual connotations.

• It is a fictional game but also based on the author's own experiences
name: I Am Etheric Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 9 3900x or similar
  • Memory: 18 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For medium, low quality
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 9 5900x or best
  • Memory: 18 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 or best
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For high quality, ( extreme requires high performance)

short_description: I Am Etheric is a realistic first-person horror game in which a man with spiritual power visits a small, secluded psychiatric hospital in a town to banish an archon who can travel through different dimensions
